text: Avdotyino () is a rural locality (a village) in Golovinskoye Rural Settlement, Sudogodsky District, Vladimir Oblast, Russia. The population was 4 as of 2010. == Geography == The village is located 17 km south-east from Golovino and 15 km west from Sudogda. == References == Category:Rural localities in Vladimir Oblast
title: Avdotyino, Sudogodsky District, Vladimir Oblast
